ability.Gorilla Tactics: Boosts the power of this Pokemon's attacks by 1.5x, but only allows the use of the first selected move.

Flare Blitz.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.

Crunch.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
